text: Grudziądz, historically in English Graudence,; the form Grudentia is used by, e.g., A. Lentz, Philologus 23 (1866), p. 175. is a city in Poland. It was in the Toruń Voivodeship from 1975 to 1998. Grudziądz is the 4th-largest city in the Kuyavian-Pomeranian Province. About 95,000 people lived here in 2018. ==References== Category:Cities in Kuyavian-Pomeranian Voivodeship
title: Grudziądz
